column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////olive oil and red pepper flakes and the handmade beef empanada. Holy smokes- the peri peri chicken is out of this world. The chicken meat itself melts in your mouth because of how well cooked it is and then the sauce
column3: you have NO self- control. Our table had five total orders of the peri- peri chicken
column4: that should tell you something. Not to mention
column5: it was gone in a matter of minutes. The salad was okay- nothing out of this world but it was among the "healthiest" guilt free
